title: cultural_data_The_Israel_Museum,_Jerusalem
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.acoustiguidemobile.am_hillwood.
Application Name: The Israel Museum, Jerusalem.
Number of Reviews: 47.00.
Application Description: The Israel Museum is the largest cultural institution in Israel and is ranked among the leading art and archaeology museums in the world. It includes the Shrine of the Book, an architectural icon, which is home to the renowned Dead Sea Scrolls, representing the oldest surviving copies of biblical texts. The Shrine complex also incorporates a large-scale model of Jerusalem in the Second Temple period.Read moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 420.00.
Overall Rate: 3.30.
First Page Reviews: to be improved. heavy download, not fully availaible in french or italian. You have to use it with the loud speaker - not possible with hearset. So, forget the audio part, the written part is fine. האפליקציה מביישת את המוזיאון, בעת הכניסה המשתמש מחוייב להוריד עדכון בן 440 מגה, ואם אתה לא רוצה? תמות. לא ניתן לעשות דבר כל עוד העדכון לא הורד, אפילו לא לחזור אחורה. רק לסגור את האפליקציה בכוח. חוסר מקצועיות. Great Very chip and unproffesional applicaton. In order to hear 1 minute of sound you need download 150mb. Other section- another 100mb. Voice guidance not exactly meet observable item. Russian language is missed. Normal map and beacon navigation is missed..
